item.title: Full Metal Alchemist
item.content:encoded: Well I was thinking of a Full Metal Alchemist world (Alchemist, name of mission) To get this Mission unlocked compelete the special mission called "alchemy" Discription is "you want to learn one of the most advanced scientific techniques known to man" You need to be S4+ Jonin and have Red Water. Part 1 is have 50+ perms, Part 2 is a mission called "Study" Which is Genjustu, 21d 15s, Part 3 is to Obtain Banki Part 4 is you unlocked the new mission type Alchemist and got 2 allies (Ed, 5+ strength, Al, 2+ levels) and you get the perm called Philosopher's Stone, 3+ nin successess also, you get the bloodline called Fullmetal +25 HP on Bingos

item.title: Trading my drop for ryo
item.description: I have a vampire cloak that i am trading
item.content:encoded:
In my possession i have a vampire cloak monster drop and i will bucket trade it for 30,000 ryo in permanent items. message Yoshirou in game or pm me on here or post here if you are interested.

Edit: Trade made

item.content:encoded: How bout every crank also increases the cost of your jutsus

item.title: deal done
item.content:encoded: Trading my Wolf Rune, please leave your offers

item.title: Bingo Requests
item.description: Need to get Bingo'd? Post here.
item.content:encoded: To prevent the forum getting overflowed with Bingo Requests, this Thread were created and Stickied to cover this. Create a post for your character, give the nessesary information (Bingo Type, Character Name, Village, Current Level), and wait for people to Bingo you. Posts may be deleted after a the request is fullfilled or after some weeks.

item.title: The Uchiha Village for trade!
item.description: Looking for Kaiju drops and, or runes. Will also trade villagers for stuff.
item.content:encoded:
The minimum is this:
2 Books, Lab Coat (or Red Water), Go Piece, Regalia, Magical Wand, Polar Star. Star, wand and Reg are switchable for something of equal value. Coat and Water can be changed for another kage useful item.
I have this offer so dont tell me its too much.

Will also trade villagers for stuff. If you want them you must make the same offer since i can trade the whole thing for equal.

item.title: Smokes and dartboard for tire tracks or fruit basket.
item.description: 200 smokes and 2 dart boards for trade i want some monster drops
item.content:encoded: if you have one of the two monster drop lat me know how many of each you want for a monster drop

item.title: i need some kaiju drops and i got a great deal
item.content:encoded:
if youre a village leader this will be perfect, i need 4 kaiju drops i need, big mouth, Fruits Basket, Money Printer,Kaiju Momento.

i got 2 accounts so it makes 8 if you village leaders would summon 4 of the kaijus twice the players in your village would attack like crazy, and im loop locked anyway so i could help in attacking i would maybe make 900 damage atleast a day if not even more.

then ill give you 120k, i dont know how to send ryo to another account but ill donate 120 to the village.

if more village leaders want to this deal it would be much better for my other account, buut i can also take the prize higher up.

item.title: -Closed-
item.content:encoded:
I'm looking for Lightning, Fox and Mantis Runes for my character McAwesome. I'll also accept a Lab Coat for one of the Runes, if that isn't considered outlandish.

Edit: I got a Fox Rune from my daily farming while waiting for Zinthos' trade, so I now have one of those to offer.

Edit*2: Got my Lightning, just need a Mantis and I'll trade my other Runes for monster drops.
